name: categorize_job_title
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool job_title_categorization.
Tool description: Accurately classify any job title. Our machine-learning API sorts job titles into two categories:
department (sales, finance,...) and level (director, manager, intern...) so you can prioritize the ones you're interested in.
API description: Categorizes a given job title using the Toolbench RapidAPI job title categorization service.

title.description: The job title to be categorized.
